title: Correction factors for different ambient air temperatures
fullText:
The ambient temperature of 45°C, on which the current ratings in Table 6 are based, is considered to be a standard value for the ambient air temperature, generally applicable for any kind of boat and for navigation in any climate.
When it is expected that the air temperature around the cables could be higher than 45°C, the current ratings from Table 6 should be reduced using the correction factors given in Table 7.
